subject: $269.90 Creative Suite 3 Design
body:
I have a great mind to believe in Christianity for the mere pleasure of fancying I may be damned.

You cannot be lost on a road that is straight.

A committee is a cul-de-sac down which ideas are lured and then quietly strangled.

Laws are subordinate to custom.

What we need is not the will to believe, but the wish to find out.

As men's prayers are a disease of the will, so are their creeds a disease of the intellect.

Authority poisons everybody who takes authority on himself.

Cast thy bread upon the waters: for thou shall find it after many days.

It is very iniquitous to make me pay my debts -- you have no idea of the pain it gives one.

The biggest critics of my books are people who never read them.

The knowledge of God is far from the love of Him.

One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.

I awoke one morning and found myself famous.
